mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.storage_code AS "storageCode", a.storage_name AS "storageName", a.storage_type AS "storageType", a.disburse_no_prefix AS "disburseNoPrefix", a.disburse_no_ava AS "disburseNoAva", a.export_no_ava AS "exportNoAva", a.export_no_prefix AS "exportNoPrefix", a.import_no_ava AS "importNoAva", a.import_no_prefix AS "importNoPrefix", a.storage_flag AS "storageFlag", a.yg_flag AS "ygFlag", a.ward_code AS "wardCode", a.org_id AS "orgId", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO drug_storage_dept( id, storage_code, storage_name, storage_type, disburse_no_prefix, disburse_no_ava, export_no_ava, export_no_prefix, import_no_ava, import_no_prefix, storage_flag, yg_flag, ward_code, org_id, create_date, create_by, update_date, update_by, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{storageCode}, #{storageName}, #{storageType}, #{disburseNoPrefix}, #{disburseNoAva}, #{exportNoAva}, #{exportNoPrefix}, #{importNoAva}, #{importNoPrefix}, #{storageFlag}, #{ygFlag}, #{wardCode}, #{orgId}, #{createDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE drug_storage_dept SET storage_code = #{storageCode}, storage_name = #{storageName}, storage_type = #{storageType}, disburse_no_prefix = #{disburseNoPrefix}, disburse_no_ava = #{disburseNoAva}, export_no_ava = #{exportNoAva}, export_no_prefix = #{exportNoPrefix}, import_no_ava = #{importNoAva}, import_no_prefix = #{importNoPrefix}, storage_flag = #{storageFlag}, yg_flag = #{ygFlag}, ward_code = #{wardCode}, org_id = #{orgId}, update_date = #{updateDate}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
